name: Aqua Pals
description:
Welcome to Aqua Pals: The Ultimate Fish Tycoon Adventure!

Dive into the mesmerizing world of aquariums with Aqua Pals, the immersive fish tycoon game that lets you create your own underwater haven. Transform simple tanks into a thriving aquatic paradise where charming fish flourish. Buy or breed happy fish to compete in dazzling fish pageants for rare prizes!

Key Features:

🐟 Aquascape Extravaganza:
Unleash your creativity as you design and customize stunning underwater landscapes within a variety of tank sizes. From intimate desktop aquariums to grand aquatic centerpieces, craft the perfect environment for your fishy friends to thrive in.

🌈 Happy, Healthy Fish:
Care for a diverse range of finned beauties, each with its own unique needs and behaviors. Keep a close eye on fish nutrition, and happiness to ensure your Aqua Pals remain vibrant and content in their carefully curated freshwater habitats.

🏆 Fish Pageants:
Take your prized, happy, and healthy aquatic companions to the stage!
Nurture your fish to perfection, then enter them into thrilling freshwater fish pageants. Show off their vibrant colors as they swim their way to victory, earning you prestigious awards and recognition.

💰 Ethical Commerce:
Build a reputation for responsible fish ownership! Well-cared-for fish are worth more in the market, reflecting your commitment to their happiness and well-being. Mean fish owners go broke!

🏅 Steam Achievements:
Master the art of fishkeeping and earn unique Steam Achievements for each fish species you successfully raise and care for. Showcase your expertise and dedication as you complete a collection of achievements that highlight your progress and accomplishments.


Immerse yourself in the enchanting depths of Aqua Pals and experience the joy of building your very own freshwater fish dynasty. Will you become the most renowned fish tycoon in the world?

The adventure begins here!
